"Jealousy can be a powerful motivator. It can drive you to work harder and strive for excellence. Instead of focusing on the success of others, channel your jealousy into your own journey. Use it as a fuel to push yourself to create something truly groundbreaking."

"Instead of being consumed by jealousy, use it as a tool to improve yourself. Analyze what others have done well and to do better. Take your skills and use them to create something truly unique and valuable."
